HomePage.title: Home
HomePage.reachUs: If you have any questions or require assistance, feel free to reach out to us.

ProfilePage.title: Profile
ProfilePage.description: Scan QR Code to enter the Main Event

AboutPage.title: ABOUT P40
AboutPage.description1: Paragon is about to turn 40. It's not about the usual celebrations. It's a moment with 14,000 Paragonians, where we will open a new and better way of thinking for the betterment of the future from today. You are the ones who decide, because “Paragon's Choice is Paragonian's Choice”.
AboutPage.description2: It's not just about celebrating Paragon's journey, but affirming that a new game has begun with greater challenges,bolder innovations, and broader impact.
AboutPage.description3: Paragon has not only survived in the industry, but also changed the game. Now, at 40 years old, after unlocking new thinking, we enter a new arena with a new mindset, ready to accelerate innovation, create global impact, and build a more advanced civilization.

PreEventPage.openingSpeechDescription: At the main event on February 28, 2025, who will open the P40 event
PreEventPage.festivalDescription1: The Paragonian Talks Festival is a Pre-Event that is one of a series of journeys towards P40. With the format of Paragonian Talks (talkshow) and Culinary Festival, it is hoped that this agenda will further increase the spirit and excitement towards P40, and emphasize “Paragon's Choice is Paragonian's Choice” and Paragon 40 this year is a moment with all paragonians.
PreEventPage.festivalDescription2: The main event of this Pre-Event is Paragonian Talks: Talkshow Across Generations. This was an interactive discussion session that involved 2 Paragonians from different generations meeting to share experiences, perspectives, and hopes.
PreEventPage.festivalDescription3: Objective: To be a platform for all to learn from each other and reverse mentoring, and appreciate each other's contribution in Paragon's 40th year journey.
PreEventPage.festivalDescription4: From the seniors we can learn about grit, the struggles that made us what we are today, the spirit that is maintained and the mutual cooperation that is applied. From the younger ones we can learn about relevance to trends, how generations evolve, and how technology transforms today.
PreEventPage.HQInauguration:
Peresmian Head Quarter with the title "Rumah yang Diusahakan Bersama" is a moment where finally Paragonians celebrate the first day of occupying a new home that has been worked on together since 2018. A bigger, wider, more sophisticated house, but there are still long tables to chat together about big dreams of usefulness. It's not just about having a large and nice place, but this is a symbol of how the realization of a dream becomes a reality. 

 A house that will be a place to give birth to new innovations that are bigger and bolder. A house that will be the best place to prepare us all towards the house of eternity. A house that will always remind us of "Kita sekarang karena kita kemarin"

MainEventPage.title: MAIN EVENT
MainEventPage.locationDescription: Will be located on your nearest Work Area
MainEventPage.do2: Masuk ke website P40 dan screenshot barcode registrasi yang ada di section profile
MainEventPage.do3: Sudah sarapan sebelum hadir ke venue. Panitia hanya menyediakan snack ringan selama acara berlangsung
MainEventPage.do5: Membawa tumbler yang sudah diisi air* bagi yang berlokasi di CGV (* panitia tidak menyediakan refill air minum)
MainEventPage.do6: Datang tepat waktu ke venue, karena acara dimulai serentak pada 07.30 WIB* untuk all area. Siapkan waktu yang cukup untuk registrasi juga karena pintu studio akan ditutup saat acara dimulai (* menyesuaikan dengan waktu setempat)
MainEventPage.do7: Tidak menggunakan Grab Corporate. Jika terdapat ketidaksesuaian, akan ditindaklanjuti sesuai dengan ketentuan perusahaan.
MainEventPage.do8: Matikan suara ponsel atau menggunakan mode getar selama acara berlangsung
MainEventPage.do11: Mengikuti dan tidak meninggalkan lokasi acara selama acara berlangung
MainEventPage.do14: Bagi Paragonian HO dan DC, kembali ke kantor untuk menikmati makan siang yang telah disediakan dan melanjutkan pekerjaan di area masing-masing
MainEventPage.dont2: Membawa tumblr bagi yang berlokasi di XXI (karena tim XXI menyediakan minum di venue)
MainEventPage.dont4: Menghidupkan flash handphone di dalam studio selama acara berlangsung
MainEventPage.dont8: Bertukar tempat tanpa izin panitia (bagi area dengan lebih dari 1 venue)
